website_summaries.verdict: Apple's utilitarian battery case for the iPhone XS, XS Max and XR offers a key battery boost and isn't annoying to use. We'll see if any other battery case ends up doing better.
pros: Apple's Smart Battery Case for the iPhone XS, XS Max and XR provides solid protection, holds about a full day's charge on its own, has pass-throughs for Lightning and all buttons and speakers or mikes, can charge on its own via Qi charging and integrates with iOS to show battery status
cons: Bulky case feels especially chunky on the XS Max
Price, at $130, is far higher than a regular battery pack that isn't also a case

customer_reviews.title: The unit charges
customer_reviews.text: The battery case charges but it keeps my Iphone XS charging. The unit has no power on/off button. How do you make the case stop charging the Iphone XS?! The Iphone XS fits snuggly in the case. It would be challenging to remove the phone if the battery case malfunctions. Shop elsewhere. The function of this battery case is very disappointing. It cost over $129.
customer_reviews.author: P. E. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Works good so far
customer_reviews.text: This is my first battery case and so far so good. I am using this on my iphone X and don't have any issues. The case adds a bit of weight but feels really nice in the hands. The battery bump actually is a nice place to rest my finger when holding the phone. Only issue I had was the first one sent out to me seemed defective and wouldn't hold a charge. Amazon was quick in sending out a replacement. Would highly recommend this case if you can get over the steep price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best battery case out there, it finally solved all my battery anxiety problems. The integration with iOS is what makes it awesome, as you can monitor the case’s charge as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Bouchan

customer_reviews.title: “This accessory is not supported” messge
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I put my phone in I got a message saying the accessory was not supported. Made me wonder..... returned the product and bought one directly from Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great while it works: Durability is questionable
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second case now since I replaced mine at Apple. The smart battery case itself is phenomenal while it works, but over time the silicon material will stretch and warp. Eventually, the case will no longer fit snug with the iPhone and will begin disconnecting and reconnecting randomly. It really becomes unbearable at a point, which really sucks, and you basically need to get it replaced. There's a one year limited warranty and a 90 day warranty on the replacement case, but can't say it would last longer than my first. Love this case to death; I've never once drained both the battery and case in one day, but man the material just doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working right after the Amazon warranty ran out
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design and functionality of this product. It's made by Apple so I expected a quality product, but the case stopped working after about 2 1/2 months. Several reviews of this product seem to have the same story as mine. Word of advice, if you buy one, be sure to copy the serial number off of the box and keep it somewhere safe. If it stops working after the Amazon warranty wears off, Apple will need that from you for a replacement, and it is impossible to read off the (black) case itself.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this Apple product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two cases for our iPhones thinking that the quality would be amazing because it is an apple product. One case died all together and the 2nd one drains the iPhone battery in 9 hours. This should not be. This is not using it for anything like videos. Only a few phone calls texts and normal light use. I am very disappointed in this product and would like to return. I no longer have the original boxes. Can we still return them? Our iPhones last longer on their own then they do using them.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Sheerin

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY AND TIME TO INVEST ON THE ORIGINAL MANUFACTURE CASE. THIS IS ACTUALLY MY SECOND CASE FIRST ONE QUIT AFTER 4 MONTHS. NOW REPLACEMENT ONE FROM APPLE STARTED THE SAME ISSUE. APPLE IS FULLY AWARE OF THE ISSUE BUT NO SIGN OF IMPROVEMENT.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: It will kill your battery
customer_reviews.text: It is May and I bought a new iPhone XS a couple of months ago. The battery health stayed at 100% for the first six weeks. I've use this battery case for two weeks and it's at 95% now.
customer_reviews.author: TimS

customer_reviews.title: IT SUCKS... BUT READ
customer_reviews.text: SO i purchased this and was really excited however as soon as i got it. the unit was just dead. Ive had left it on a 30w adapter usb c to lighting and for 3 hours it still would not charged, i had to return it unfortunately but wish it would have worked. I probably would have kept it. however Amazon offered to send me a new one but decided that ill just return it fully since it was definitely a pricey piece. all i can say that the case was very well made construction the only thing i hate about it is the damn felt or whatever material they use cause its a dust lint magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Grail05

customer_reviews.title: The Security blanket you didn't know you needed!
customer_reviews.text: I had an Apple Battery case for my previous iPhone and loved it. When I upgraded I didn't think I would care or need it but it is like that security blanket you didn't know you needed. It is nice to have the extra battery back up. It is a little bulky on the back due to the battery pack in the case but as I woman, I don't mind. I carry my phone in my hand or in my purse. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mdluvs2shop

customer_reviews.title: Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: No off on button. Battery life is very poor. Not worth the money I paid. Just because it’s Apple the quality is poor
customer_reviews.author: Brown Geo

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my new XS however it does not connect well. When I have this on my phone, it will not connect to my car at all. As soon as I take the case off, the phone connects perfectly. Seems as though the connection is loose. Phone can be sitting on my desk and dings like you just plugged it in to charge- over and over again all day long. BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Not a recommended Charging Case
customer_reviews.text: I had this same charging case for 2 previous IOS phone versions with zero problems over multiple years. BUT the X charging case keeps breaking. The first one I sent back and got a replacement but the replacement broke also after a few weeks. It won’t charge even though it’s fully powered and/or plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Worked for three weeks, then returned
customer_reviews.text: This battery case worked fine for about three weeks and then stopped working. It would not charge despite trying numerous known good cables etc. I had to return it as it was very expensive and became a worthless paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed in this battery pack. I haven’t had it for 2 months and already it is not working. I have t dropped my phone or compromised the case in any way. Prior to this I had a Mophie and I would purchase that again before I’d buy another Apple Battery Case again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J Tebo

customer_reviews.title: Released me from looking for an outlet everywhere all day
customer_reviews.text: No slip, nice grip, attractive. OS12 killed my battery daily. I’m on the go and on my phone all day and was looking for and outlet like a fiend everywhere, all day. During meetings, at restaurants, in the car, at clients’ homes... This has removed that stress from my life - it feels stupid how stressful it was. I now just stress about more important things.
customer_reviews.author: Infrareda

customer_reviews.title: Great phone case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone case, i have a pink one and my bf has a black one. The battery life is great and it is sleek and very nice looking. It is heavy but nothing you cannot get used to. The two bad things would be that when you drop it on anything but carpet it will break the silicone and you cannot fix it. If you get a light colored one it does stain so be aware. Overall great phone case and will purchase in the future again if i change phone models.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Once I charged the case up I can go a full 24hrs with out charging it if need be and my phone doesnt get hot at all my phone has been on 100% for 2 days now an that with VERY VERY HEAVY USE an the case feels good in the hand
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas manning

customer_reviews.title: Very good. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It has wireless charging. When attached, the pack is constantly charging your phone until the pack dies and your phone is at 100%. At first I thought a on/off switch would be better, but this system works well. It's very easy to take on and off, so you can charge it separately or leave at home when you don't need it. There is a small light inside that show it's charging. The silicon grip is nice, not sticky or too dusty. My only slight negative is that it can be heavy for some when attached to the phone or bulky in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: baat

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but DIRTY!!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it does it’s job extremely well. It charges my phone and keeps it protected and it’s so easy to use. BUT it got extremely dirty almost immediately. The whole thing is now yellow/brown. In less than a month, it was disgusting. I’ve tried everything to clean it - the recommended dry cloth, a damp cloth, a magic eraser, bleach cleaners.....nothing will work. I love it so much, I think I’ll try a different color, but I’m so very disappointed. I’ve had it for just over a month now. (Btw, this is during the quarantine, I’m staying home and not even wearing makeup that might cause this.)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Added hours is a great piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Works good nice grip and feel, added battery is a real piece of mind, case drains faster than I thought it would last but it’s good enough for me
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Purchsased a refurbished one from Amazon - Not working
customer_reviews.text: Took a shot of saving money and bought an Amazon refurbished one. Got it yesterday. It is not accepting a charge. Looked on line and saw there has been issues with certain Apple smart cases. I thought Amazon tested them all before sending out these refurbished ones, I guess this one slipped through. I will send it back and go for the money for a new one from Apple. by the way Apple IPhone batterys stink. They make me spend $149 bucks for a battery case to compensate. Next phone will not be an Apple unless they fix their batteries
customer_reviews.author: Raymond A. Rasa

customer_reviews.title: These are the defective ones.
customer_reviews.text: Apple made some defective smart battery cases for the iPhone xs. This is that batch. It will work for a little while then stop charging. Apple's website has all the information.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Defective - Doesnt Charge Steadily
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this considering the price and the fact that it is an Apple product but unfortunately it just didn't hit the spot. I got my case in today and after charging it completely it doesn't want to charge my phone in a steady manner. I know it is the case and not my phone because I've cleaned out the port and used a few other lightning cables I have laying around. Very disappointed and hope the cheaper battery case I bought will be a more than adequate replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Pulls charge from the phone itself
customer_reviews.text: It’s great when it works but after awhile it stops holding a charge. What I hate most about it is that there are instances where it would take charge from my phone and charge itself. Not sure how to fix that but I end up just charging my phone by itself whenever that happens. Durability is great since I’ve dropped it so many times and the only time its left a dent was when it fell on concrete. Would probably buy it again since it looks sleeker than the 3rd party battery cases
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not Actually New
customer_reviews.text: On the back of Apple Products like these, there's a small plastic pull tab on the back that you have to tear off before you can pull up and out the actual product. When I received the product (as new in the item description), the pull tab had already been torn off, and so I can only assume it was not new, and sealed in package. It was also delivered with a 0% charge. They usually come charged to around 50%. Slightly upset.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT FOR ME!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS CASE! I have had nothing but problems it stops charging intermittently the rubber case is falling apart it’s not worth the 130 plus dollars at all. I bought 2 and both had the same issues now that the 30 day warranty expired I’m out of all that money smdh!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but a little finicky
customer_reviews.text: Silicone starts to wear off over time but that’s to be expected. It went from a clear white to a gray color. Besides that my only complaint is that the wireless charger doesn’t charge it as easy since it’s so thick, so it has to be placed precisely or it won’t keep a charge. Bonus - it works on an iPhone X too.
customer_reviews.author: Raki

customer_reviews.title: Works with wired CarPlay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take on a road trip where I knew we would be away from chargers and using the iPhone X a lot. The battery case worked great and was a lot easier than hauling an external battery and cable. My car does not have wireless CarPlay but connecting through the lightning connector (wired) works! I suspect my older IQ chargers do not sort out the fact that there are two batteries to charge but a simple work around for me was to let my wall charger charge an external battery and let that battery charge the case and phone. This was the only case I found that supported lightning port pass through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible investment
customer_reviews.text: It was my second purchase and had to return it given that same as te first one after a month, charging became spontaneous and not constant
customer_reviews.author: JOSE MANUEL BALMORI

customer_reviews.title: Why not to but this
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about a week and then the battery case became very hot and stopped charging and the speakers stopped working and I highly revetments not buying this product
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Worked only for one month!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this when it worked, but now it is useless and completely stopped working in little over a month. Not worth the money! Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Works with the iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: Yes this fits and works perfect on my iPhone X. I looked around the web trying to confirm this would fit and then just took the plunge and bought it. Very Happy.
customer_reviews.author: James Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Superior Battery Case
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. I had purchase a knock off here on Amazon for $40 and the lightning charger broke on the second day. This case is heavy duty, but still not too bulky. Charges a little slow, but nothing to really complain about as it's purpose is to keep your phone charged and that is does perfectly. Don't waste your money on a knock off and just get the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gerrish

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Something is wrong with this charging case. It charges over night, bit only charges the phone if it is not being used... and very slow. There is no point as when the phone itself looses charge, it turns off while the charger case is fully or close to fully charged still
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: Function wise is perfect. Phone charges first battery second. Phone uses case battery first, phone battery second. Lightning port means use same cable you already have. And all functionality remains like CarPlay data sync etc. the only thing I could think to complain about is that phone with case is heavy now.
customer_reviews.author: mcf

customer_reviews.title: Apple cords/charging blocks sometimes rejected by this case.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case for about a month or so now and it has recently (in the past week) started occasionally rejecting the Apple cords and charging blocks. I have to unplug it and retry it for it to work sometimes. Not sure what’s going on with it but if it gets worse I’ll have to remove this case from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: 100% battery at 830 PM
customer_reviews.text: I was happy that it charges wirelessly and you don’t have to make it charge your phone, it just does it automatically.... but it’s a game changer that’s for sure
customer_reviews.author: HardinDiamondCut

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: A little pricy, but serves the purpose I purchased it for. Makes phone last two days with heavy usage. I wasn’t too concerned with being able to select when the battery operated. I much prefer the technology and integration with the iPhone that apple provides in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Not any better than the $30 options. Don’t waste your money. Really disappointed in a product from apple turning out to be junk.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: This case fizzled out.
customer_reviews.text: Bought in February. Now it doesn’t hold a charge. Definitely would not purchase this case again. Pretty sad.
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: I love everything except the price
customer_reviews.text: This case is awsome gives me so much battery’s life has saved me from many instances were my phone dies.
customer_reviews.author: Neber

customer_reviews.title: Only a few months old and glitching out.. draining etc
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few apple battery cases and they have been great and have lasted a very long time.. this one can no longer give me the power needed to get though one day and it is tripping out and glitching. 🤷‍♂️ Maybe it is a Chinese knock off with an apple label or they let the quality of their product dwindle in the past years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mophie vs. this case
customer_reviews.text: Comparing this charging case to the Mophie, this one has a longer charge time and I can go longer between charging. However, with the Mophie, I can turn on and off the charging with the push of a button which I find much more practical and convenient. If I had to choose between the two cases, I would pick this one for the longevity and that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't charge right
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for about a month...now I have to charge my phone and the case separately. NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.author: DanaEFox

customer_reviews.title: Wireless charging stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: I love the Apple smart cases and have been using them since the iPhone 6. This one however worked great for the first month and now the wireless charging capability has stopped functioning completely. Plugging the case in still charges it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: B L

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Stay way after a month or so it stopped changing and now it won’t even change waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Rune

customer_reviews.title: Battery case stopped charging after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Battery stopped charging after 3 months. Apple initially declined to replace because no receipt because purchased thru Amazon. Eventually resolution on track. Buy thru Apple so product is registered.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Pontin

customer_reviews.title: At the sale price I got it, it's a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Apple products are almost always great! They connect seamlessly to other apple products. This is no different. Unfortunately, Apple products do seem overpriced. However at the $60 price I got it for, this was an awesome buy. My phone now lasts well past a 10 hour shift and beyond whereas before, I'd be lucky to get 8hrs of juice out of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good battery, weak materials.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my iPhone battery full while I’m traveling all day. I’ve had it less than two months and noticed the rubber around the ringer switch is already torn. Poor build quality compared to the one I used to have with my iPhone 7 that lasted for at least 2 years with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Nice product again from Apple, but not great value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Great design again from Apple. It’s just a bit overpriced, as expected from Apple. The wireless charging is a little temperamental, the phone is constantly on charge from the battery, so when you put it on a wireless charger, there is no automatic buzz or notification that the case is in fact charging.
customer_reviews.author: GabrielO

customer_reviews.title: Case randomly connects and disconnects from phone causing intermittent charging
customer_reviews.text: The case is basically shorting out. It randomly connects and disconnects from the iphone causing intermittent charging. This makes the phone vibrate sometimes constantly. Can't figure out how to return via Amazon or Apple's website.
customer_reviews.author: guy

customer_reviews.title: Case is defective
customer_reviews.text: Item defective, I have had this case before, bought at Best Buy and worked great, ordered another case from Amazon, case fully charged but it would not charge my phone at all, returning and buying one at Best Buy
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Parsons

customer_reviews.title: More Power
customer_reviews.text: The case obviously adds weight and size but that’s part of it. It’s just like the Apple silicone cases but with a battery that will take you much further.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: Same case as Apple’s and cheaper as well
customer_reviews.text: This case is the exact same case Apple sells for more money - obviously it’s the same case from Amazon and works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Blinn

customer_reviews.title: Apple does it again
customer_reviews.text: Like everything Apple makes it’s quality at a price. Works great, looks great and is of best quality. You can find better battery life cases but none that functions and looks as well as this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but chipped
customer_reviews.text: The case is very nice. The texture is the standard silicone case which decreases slippage. It’s definitely more expensive than some of the other brands, but I’m hoping over time that this will be worth it. The only reason I’m giving 3 stars is that the original case I received had a chip in it (see picture). I’m not sure if this was returned before but I hope that they don’t give it to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great Batter Case
customer_reviews.text: Great batter case for iPhone Xs. Fits perfectly and holds a significant charge. I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: KJF

customer_reviews.title: It's great not to every worry about running out of battery
customer_reviews.text: I'm always confident that my battery will last all day. No matter if I'm traveling, on the road or whatever I'm doing throughout the day. My only issue is that I cannot determine the remaining battery life of the case battery. It's not quite smart enough. Awesome accessory though.
customer_reviews.author: William Gorden

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you update you ios!
customer_reviews.text: So far the best option that is reliable and backed by a reputable company compared to other knock offs and gimmicky battery options. Note, you need to make sure your iphone is updated with the lates ios to make it work
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Overall good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good grip in hand, more ergonomic shape compare to my other cases without battery, good elevation of rubber on edges saved a screen few times. Capacity is not fantastic, but good enough. And all thing will be heavier, not for people who typing endlessly
customer_reviews.author: Sergiy

customer_reviews.title: Mal function after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 5 months. Now the case is having trouble staying connected to my iphone and is constantly dinging in my pocket that is is charging on/off. Hoping apple support will help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work how I thought it worked, I am used to mophie battery packs that you turn on to charge your device when low. The case is always on, so the device runs off case battery then to phone. Besides that I love this case
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Good buy...  great when it works correct
customer_reviews.text: Works great when it works right.... at some points it’s drains the battery from the phone to charge the case itself..
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lubo

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s really good. Might as well buy the real deal instead of these fake ones. They can kill your battery quick.
customer_reviews.author: Korotoumou Toure

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 2 months. It glitches out and charging shows on and off. It was great when it was working but like what the other reviewers here say that it does not last long. For 100$+ its not worth the price for something that only last a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Ericson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Couple bucks cheaper here than at the Apple store. Does what’s its supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Eventually this blinks on and off charging, and then quits altogether
customer_reviews.text: After owning 5 of these, for some reason they stop connecting to the phone full time and blink on and off charging before quitting completely. Weird.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Becnel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 4 months ago. It was my favorite case thus far. Durable, reliable, and soft. However, it suddenly stopped working last night and is no longer charging. For $100, I’d expect more than 4 months of use. Very disappointing. I would not recommend wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Carse

customer_reviews.title: Great battery case
customer_reviews.text: Works great. At times it drains the phones battery - to fix this, simply pop it off and slide it back on. I find it a little slippery at times. Overall, very happy. Battery performance is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff koshy

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY, HIGHLY DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: Never buy a refurbished case. Took a chance and got this case for a low price, but now it struggles with charging consistently. Huge waste of $90
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yamasaki

customer_reviews.title: Always works
customer_reviews.text: Great option, since I don't like carry a spare charger
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy used!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy Amazon’s used cases because they’re a rip off. They would say that it is in very good condition and it wouldn’t. I would recommend buying the item new or not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Woods

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the added battery life to my phone. This case never comes off! It displays the percentage on the home screen of my phone which is awesome. The only thing I don’t like is it isn’t super durable. The material has chunks taken out of it from the smallest drops or hits.
customer_reviews.author: Lanie Lené

customer_reviews.title: Are you looking for an hour or so more juice - look no further
customer_reviews.text: In accordance with apples insatiable need to provide middle of the pack battery life, this 40 lb sleeve is exactly what I expected. Now instead of getting from morning to noon out of a charge, I get enough of a charge to make it thru the end of lunch! Thanks for innovating so hard apple!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Double the battery
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Allows me to work on full mode without needing to charge 24-28 hours.
customer_reviews.author: RAE

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my phone and uses the apple charger! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Welch

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! Have had with all my iPhones for years! This is a must purchase if you use your phone a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid batter case
customer_reviews.text: Random charging issues where the case stays charged and the phone depletes. Just unplug phone from case and plug it back in again. Typically that solves it. Other than that, love this thing. Haven’t need to charge my phone during the day in weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: The battery is starting to inflate, it has a small bump but still noticeable. Im starting to worry.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Santana

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Give me double the battery, last me 2 days of heavy use. Easily can last 3 days normal use.
customer_reviews.author: turtle

customer_reviews.title: Cannot pair with Popsocket or Ring
customer_reviews.text: Battery is great, but the case is rubber and so you cannot stick any popsocket or ring to it. I even tried with command strips- nothing sticks. I rely on my ring and a stand and grip, so the benefit of that outweighs benefit of battery.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Not attached to a wall charger
customer_reviews.text: I like the case, especially when I’m at work. I don’t have to bring my charger with me and I work 12 hour shifts. The case is a little heavy so I added a pop socket to the back of it, so it’s easier to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Jackson

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, feels great, not overly bulky, does a great job protecting my phone. I do believe that it is a bit over priced.
customer_reviews.author: M Birdsong

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: What a difference not to have to charge my phone every night. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A

customer_reviews.title: Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: I love the case don’t get me wrong. It’s battery time is outstanding however I dropped my phone with the case and the case itself ended up breaking the henges around my screen causing the face recognition to not work
customer_reviews.author: Karim Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: Overall great case .....but
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a number of these cases as I moved up the iPhone series. Occasionally the plug becomes In the case breaks forcing me to replace the whole pack. I figure I’m wearing out the case and not the phone plug but it is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Horrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t charge my phone unless I squeeze top and bottom tightly then once I let go stops charging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked for 30 days and then no longer charged
customer_reviews.text: nice design and not bulky, but the battery stopped charging 30 days later
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: way to expensive and it does not performance well
customer_reviews.text: I will say it is a good way to have an extra battery but I had few issues where phone dies and connected and only charged the case and not the phone and my battery will die way faster now.
customer_reviews.author: diego

customer_reviews.title: Died after 45 days.
customer_reviews.text: This case worked great...for 45 days! Then it quit charging! VERY disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.text: This has not worked well since the day I got it. It’s not in sinc with my iPhone and dosnt allow my iPhone to take a charge. I have to take case off IPhone and charge separately, not the way it should work.
customer_reviews.author: sammy Epstien

customer_reviews.title: Holds the i phone very well
customer_reviews.text: Great for holding the i phone. Little bit bulky. Does slip off the belt when making certain moves. Am going to try a case which uses a belt loop so it can not slip off the belt.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Michael J. Serino

customer_reviews.title: Pure awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how inexpensive this is! It more than doubled my battery life and it is smaller than my otter box was. Not as durable as the otter box but all in all this is the best case I have ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Perron

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that it doesn’t have an on/off button Other than that battery case is nice
customer_reviews.author: Aziz Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of faulty cases
customer_reviews.text: The battery case stopped working less than a month after I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product the other day and it’s help tremendously! I am an owner of a restaurant and I’m always on the go this has saved me time and less worry about my phone and more on my business!
customer_reviews.author: David Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but price is too much
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product, it seems to be only like a Substitute for when you need to charger your phone, vs a full time use as a case. Because my case only lasted 3 months till it started to act up and stop working
customer_reviews.author: Edward Villarroel

customer_reviews.title: Terrible support for defective item.
customer_reviews.text: This case worked intermittently immediately after opening and using one time. This case was part of the Apple Smart Battery Replacement Program and has been an issue getting service through Apple and Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

product_meta.title: Apple Smart Battery Case (for iPhone Xs) - Black
feature_bullets: The case can be charged even faster with USB-PD compatible chargers.
It also supports Lightning accessories, such as the Ear Pods with Lightning Connector (included with your iPhone), or the Lightning Digital AV Adapter (sold separately).
